description:
Sunny, private studio apt on top floor 
of a pre-war building in charming Carroll Gardens.

New Casper Queen-size bed. Large 48" TV with Netflix and Hulu. Full kitchen with keurig coffee maker and toaster. Large bathroom ( by NYC standards!) with bathtub and shower. 

Very close to the F and G train at Carroll station 
and just a short ride into Manhattan

Many local restaurants, bars, and organic markets line nearby give Carroll Gardens a cozy neighborhood feel.

The apt is yours for your stay.

I live nearby and will be available for you.

https://www.airbnb.com/locations/new-york/carroll-gardens

F and G train very close by.

Easily hail a taxi from Clinton or Court St.

Citybikes now  available.
name: Scandinavian Studio Carroll Gardens
review: The host canceled this reservation 54 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
